starters.title: Grilled Peaches
starters.description: Grilled peach, goat's cheese, peach chutney, rocket, mixed seed crackers and onion ash

starters.title: Céleste Snails
starters.description: Snails in the wood fired oven, tomato and garlic stew, herb butter, mozzarella and gruyère

starters.title: Octopus
starters.description: Coal fired octopus, potato and halloumi with coriander and garlic, lemon aioli, sundried tomato

mains.title: Chargrilled Chicken
mains.description: Chargrilled chicken thighs, blackbean and potato with smoked chilli, bone marrow and lime salsa, leafy salad

mains.title: Céleste Cane
mains.description: Confit duck leg finished in the Josper, cumin and raisin mole, sweet potato, salad of confit duck breast, cauliflower, root vegetables and bean sprouts

mains.title: Honey Aubergine
mains.description: Miso honey aubergine in wood oven, lentil and shitake mushroom, greens, sweet potato
